details: Added more options for VectorNSTLink service.
Fixed automatic word wrapping and removed code outline in the SVGEditorLink.
Added automatic build and push docker image to dockerhub using GitHub Actions.
VectorWeaverLink frontend and backend services implemented.
CORS policy and json data forwarding configured.
Implemented a check for the availability of the backend server.
ChangelogLink info moved to separate page.
Updated passing data to SVGEditorLink method. SessionStorage is now used instead of outletContext.
Added stub messages info about specifying input parameters before running services.
New unpublished ports configured on all services.
CORS policy configured for all services.
Check for the availability of the backend add for all services.
Backend Host moved to new IP: api.statanly.com and CORS updated.
New papers and projects info added.
Moved to HTTPS instead of HTTP.
Multilingual support has been added. The site is now Russified.
The code for creating Changelogs has been significantly simplified.
